p: Akha people in Mengla planted fleagrass together with rice in swidden field [ 12], but there are few swidden fields in China now. Therefore, the first question this study aims to answer is as follows: How is fleagrass planted and utilized now? At present, fleagrass is only reported to be used by Akha people in Mengla. We also try to understand these questions: Is fleagrass used in nearby areas? How is it used in nearby area? Furthermore, why is it used in that way?
